summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City employment; amending SMC Section 4.04.035 authorizing employee use of sick leave for the care of a child whose school or childcare service is cancelled during and due to a pandemic emergency; amending SMC Section 4.04.040 to modify reporting requirements for payment of sick leave used during a pandemic emergency; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
committee: Culture, Civil Rights, Health and Personnel
